transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Michael. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to make a payment on my credit card.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have a speech disability, please be patient with me

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for your patience. I'll make sure to accommodate your needs.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
